short_summary: INSPECTION AND SERVICE OF VEHICLE AND PLATFORM HOISTS
description: The OP Department of National Defence requires a contractor to provide inspection and maintenance services for heavy equipment located at 4 Wing Cold Lake, Cold Lake, AB. This contract will be a long-term agreement covering inspections, maintenance, repairs, and installation of hydraulic/electrical ramps and hoists.
full_summary:
### Government Tender Announcement

#### Project Details
- **Project Title**: W6895-230093 - Inspect and Service Vehicle and Platform Hoists
- **Reference Number**: WS4057358633-Doc4162232861
- **Amendment Number**: 1
- **Solicitation Number**: WS4057358633
- **Publication Date**: August 28, 2023
- **Tender Closing Date**: September 14, 2023 (2:00 PM EDT)
- **Amendment Date**: August 30, 2023
- **Expected Contract Start Date**: November 8, 2023
- **Expected Contract End Date**: August 6, 2026

#### Tender Information
- **Tender Status**: Expiré
- **Procurement Category**: Service
- **Procurement Method**: Competitive - Open Bidding
- **Trade Agreements**: Canada-Peru Free Trade Agreement (CPFTA), Canadian Free Trade Agreement (CFTA), Canada-Honduras Free Trade Agreement, Canada-Korea Free Trade Agreement (CKFTA), Canada-Chile Free Trade Agreement (CCFTA), Canada-Panama Free Trade Agreement, Canada-Colombia Free Trade Agreement

#### Contracting Entity and End User Entities
- **Contracting Entity**: Department of Public Works and Government Services (PSPC)
- **Contracting Entity Address**: 11 Laurier St, Phase III, Place du Portage, Gatineau, Quebec K1A 0S5, Canada
- **End User Entity**: Department of National Defence (DND)
- **End User Entity Address**: 101 Colonel By Dr, Ottawa, Ontario K1A 0K2, Canada

#### Notice andAttachment Information
- **Notice URL**: https://discovery.ariba.com/rfx/17287110?extsite=MTcyODcxMTBfQU4wMTQ4NDA1MDk5Mg==
- **Attachment**: None

#### Description
The Department of National Defence (DND) is seeking a Standing Offer Agreement (SOA) for the inspection and maintenance of vehicle and platform hoists located at 4 Wing Cold Lake. The successful Offeror will be responsible for providing all labour, materials, tools, equipment, transportation, and supervision necessary for inspections, maintenance, repairs, and installation of hydraulic/electrical ramps and hoists on an "as required" basis. The tender closing deadline is September 14, 2023
